Package com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LiBrowseActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying the Nodes present in a community.
    LiConversationActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying the Message reply thread.
    LiCreateMessageActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying the Ask a Question screen.
    LiMessageListActivity
    This activity is responsible for painting the the article list on the screen.
    LiReportAbuseActivity
    Created by Lithium Technologies Inc on 4/5/17.
    LiSearchActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying the Search screen.
    LiSupportHomeActivity
    The main entry point for Support action workflow.
